Posts.EditableText:
On an earlier version of quest (v5.2) I had a nice code working that displayed a list of visible objects in they current room.

I've loaded up the same project and it is now throwing up an error running script: error evaluating script

FormatObjectList("You can see", player.parent, "and", ".", true)

Any suggestions?
Posts.HTML:
On an earlier version of quest (v5.2) I had a nice code working that displayed a list of visible objects in they current room.

I've loaded up the same project and it is now throwing up an error running script: error evaluating script

FormatObjectList("You can see", player.parent, "and", ".", true)

Any suggestions?

Posts.EditableText:
I have a feeling the final parameter is no long used. Try:

FormatObjectList("You can see", player.parent, "and", ".")
